(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNP Ever))
    (VP (VBD thought)
      (PP (IN about)
        (S
          (VP (VBG hosting)
            (NP (DT an) (JJ intimate) (NN dinner) (NN party))
            (PP (IN for)
              (NP (PRP$ your) (NNS friends)))))))
    (. ?)))


nsubj(thought-2, Ever-1)
root(ROOT-0, thought-2)
prep(thought-2, about-3)
pcomp(about-3, hosting-4)
det(party-8, an-5)
amod(party-8, intimate-6)
nn(party-8, dinner-7)
dobj(hosting-4, party-8)
prep(hosting-4, for-9)
poss(friends-11, your-10)
pobj(for-9, friends-11)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP am)
      (ADJP (JJ sure)
        (SBAR
          (S
            (NP (PRP you))
            (VP
              (VP (VBP have))
              (CC and)
              (VP
                (PP (IN for)
                  (NP
                    (NP (DT those))
                    (PP (IN of)
                      (NP (PRP us)))
                    (SBAR
                      (WHNP (WP who))
                      (S
                        (VP (VB cook))))))))))))
    (, ,)))


nsubj(sure-3, I-1)
cop(sure-3, am-2)
root(ROOT-0, sure-3)
nsubj(have-5, you-4)
ccomp(sure-3, have-5)
cc(have-5, and-6)
conj(have-5, for-7)
pobj(for-7, those-8)
prep(those-8, of-9)
pobj(of-9, us-10)
nsubj(cook-12, who-11)
rcmod(those-8, cook-12)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP it))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (ADVP (RB usually))
      (NP (DT an) (NN opportunity)
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB show)
              (PRT (RP off))
              (NP (PRP$ our) (JJ culinary) (NNS skills)))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(opportunity-5, it-1)
cop(opportunity-5, is-2)
advmod(opportunity-5, usually-3)
det(opportunity-5, an-4)
root(ROOT-0, opportunity-5)
aux(show-7, to-6)
infmod(opportunity-5, show-7)
prt(show-7, off-8)
poss(skills-11, our-9)
amod(skills-11, culinary-10)
dobj(show-7, skills-11)


(ROOT
  (S (CC But)
    (NP
      (NP (DT the) (NN problem))
      (PP (IN with)
        (NP (DT that))))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (S
        (NP (PRP you))
        (VP
          (VP (VB end)
            (PRT (RP up))
            (S
              (VP (VBG going)
                (PRT (RP in)
                  (CC and)
                  (RP out))
                (PP (IN of)
                  (NP (DT the) (NN kitchen))))))
          (CC and)
          (VP (VB miss)
            (PRT (RP out))
            (PP (IN on)
              (NP (DT the) (NN fellowship)))))))
    (. .)))


cc(is-6, But-1)
det(problem-3, the-2)
nsubj(is-6, problem-3)
prep(problem-3, with-4)
pobj(with-4, that-5)
root(ROOT-0, is-6)
nsubj(end-8, you-7)
ccomp(is-6, end-8)
prt(end-8, up-9)
xcomp(end-8, going-10)
prt(going-10, in-11)
cc(in-11, and-12)
dep(in-11, out-13)
prep(going-10, of-14)
det(kitchen-16, the-15)
pobj(of-14, kitchen-16)
cc(end-8, and-17)
conj(end-8, miss-18)
prt(miss-18, out-19)
prep(miss-18, on-20)
det(fellowship-22, the-21)
pobj(on-20, fellowship-22)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (PP (IN Furthermore))
    (, ,)))


root(ROOT-0, Furthermore-1)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP it))
    (VP (MD would)
      (VP (VB be)
        (ADJP (RB very) (JJ difficult))
        (SBAR (IN if)
          (S
            (NP (PRP you))
            (VP (VBP are)
              (VP (VBG planning)
                (S
                  (VP (TO to)
                    (VP (VB do)
                      (NP (DT a) (CD 8) (NN course)))))))))))
    (, ,)))


nsubj(difficult-5, it-1)
aux(difficult-5, would-2)
cop(difficult-5, be-3)
advmod(difficult-5, very-4)
root(ROOT-0, difficult-5)
mark(planning-9, if-6)
nsubj(planning-9, you-7)
aux(planning-9, are-8)
advcl(difficult-5, planning-9)
aux(do-11, to-10)
xcomp(planning-9, do-11)
det(course-14, a-12)
num(course-14, 8-13)
dobj(do-11, course-14)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NN gourmet) (NN type))
    (VP (VBZ meal)
      (SBAR
        (WHADVP (WRB where))
        (S
          (NP (DT each) (NN course))
          (VP (VBZ has)
            (S
              (VP (TO to)
                (VP (VB be)
                  (VP (VBN constructed)
                    (ADVP (RB just) (RB prior)
                      (PP (TO to)
                        (S
                          (VP (VBG serving)))))))))))))
    (. .)))


nn(type-2, gourmet-1)
nsubj(meal-3, type-2)
root(ROOT-0, meal-3)
advmod(has-7, where-4)
det(course-6, each-5)
nsubj(has-7, course-6)
advcl(meal-3, has-7)
aux(constructed-10, to-8)
auxpass(constructed-10, be-9)
xcomp(has-7, constructed-10)
advmod(prior-12, just-11)
advmod(constructed-10, prior-12)
prep(prior-12, to-13)
pcomp(to-13, serving-14)
